code: import{createTheme}from"@mui/material";export var GCU_COLOR={darkPurple:"#440b66",green:"#1d804b",purple:"#4e2399",lightPurple:"#532496",extraLightPurple:"#e5deee",white:"#ffffff",orange:"#fe6901",border:"#d7d7d6",textSecondary:"#a0a0a0"};export var PURPLE_GRADIENT="linear-gradient(0.25turn, ".concat(GCU_COLOR.darkPurple,", ").concat(GCU_COLOR.purple,")");export var GCU_ASSETS={logo:"/gcu-logo.svg"};export var SPACING="1rem";export var BORDER_RADIUS="8px";export var spacing=function spacing(n){return"calc(".concat(SPACING," * ").concat(n,")");};export var GCU_HEIGHTS={loadingBar:"24px",topBar:"56px",bottomBar:"56px",cardBar:"56px",barCodeHeight:72};export var theme=createTheme({palette:{mode:"light"}});
